Original:
這家店真的是個不錯的去處！我們平日聚在一起，一壺水煙和暢快的喝酒，簡直是一種享受。水煙的味道真是讓人回味無窮，而且他們還可以換炭，真是貼心。環境布置雖然不華麗，但卻讓人感到舒適，再加上那些動聽的音樂，讓整個氛圍更加愉悅。最讓人難以忘懷的是他們家的pizza，每一口都散發著誘人的香氣，美味得讓人不禁多吃幾片。

而且價格方面，我們都覺得相當實惠，這樣的好地方，收費卻不會過高，真是太難得了。更讓人感到溫馨的是，老闆娘的親切。她總是笑容滿面，讓我們感受到宾至如歸的待遇。這樣的熱情服務，更讓我們感受到這家店的溫暖。

我們朋友們都一致認為，這絕對是個下次還能再來的好地方，甚至已經成為了我們之間的一個小秘密基地。每次想到聚會，第一個浮現在腦海的就是這家店的美好回憶。我們迫不及待地期待著再次來到這個令人陶醉的地方，繼續享受水煙、美食和愉快的時光！
EN:
This shop is really a good place!We gather together on weekdays, a pot of water cigarettes and drinking drinking is simply a kind of enjoyment.The taste of water cigarettes is really memorable, and they can also change charcoal, which is really intimate.Although the environmental layout is not gorgeous, it makes people feel comfortable. Coupled with those beautiful music, the whole atmosphere is more pleasant.The most unforgettable thing is their Pizza. Each bite exudes a seductive aroma, which makes people eat a few more.

And in terms of price, we all feel quite affordable. In such a good place, the charges will not be too high, which is really rare.What makes people even more warm is that the boss's kindness.She always smiled and made us feel the treatment of the guests.Such enthusiastic services make us feel the warmth of this shop.

Our friends have agreed that this is definitely a good place to come again next time, and it has even become a small secret base between us.Every time I think of a party, the first one to come to mind is the beautiful memories of this shop.We can't wait to come to this intoxicating place again, and continue to enjoy water cigarettes, food and pleasant time!
